title: Candidate URL Schema
description: Schema for candidate URLs discovered from discovery seed sources

url.description: The candidate URL to be validated and potentially scraped

source_seed.description: The discovery seed source URL that led to this candidate

discovered_from.description: The specific page URL where this candidate link was found

confidence.description: Confidence score (0.0-1.0) indicating relevance to scholarship discovery

reason.description: Human-readable explanation of why this candidate was discovered and its confidence score

discovered_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this candidate was discovered
